channel.title: Monsters on TestScape.. Please help!
channel.description:
I was on my TestScape yesterday and i spawned a NPC.. and i hit a 0 and the monster died?! how can i edit this so i can atleast kill it!
Also.. Anything that i can kill, Rats, Gaurds.. etc they only drop dwarf remains? How can i change this too?
Please help[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 04:16:13 AM[/size][hr]Oww come on help please[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 04:54:18 AM[/size][hr]HELP![br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 05:29:07 AM[/size][hr]Post please.
